mapper.sql: answerid, answerspaperid, namePaper, personnelid, isqualified, begindate, enddate, remarks, enddateofmarking, releasedate, issubmit, submitdate, totalscore
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from answer
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into answer (answerid, answerspaperid, namePaper, personnelid, isqualified, begindate, enddate, remarks, enddateofmarking, releasedate, issubmit, submitdate, totalscore) values (#{answerid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{answerspaperid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{namepaper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personnelid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isqualified,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{begindate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{enddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enddateofmarking,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{releasedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{issubmit,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{submitdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{totalscore,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update answer

answerspaperid = #{answerspaperid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
